description:
Shirogane Noel is a http://anidb.net/cr62904 [virtual YouTuber] that has also starred in anime.
While she is easy-going, she has a dangerous side where she attempts to solve all her problems with muscle power. As much as this fluffy, meatheaded knight hungers for power, she came to the world of VTubers where all the stronk people are, for training.
Source: Hololive Production
name: Shirogane Noel
